bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame, seatstay & chainstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, internal derailleur cable routing, Stealth dropper post routing, ISCG 05 mount, magnesium EVO Link, 130mm travel

components.description: DT Swiss XM 1550 Tricon, 15mm front hub; 142x12mm rear hub w/24-hole, tubeless rims (no spoke holes)
Bontrager XR3 Team Issue, Tubeless Ready, 26x2.20"
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Cane Creek IS-3, E2, fully integrated alloy cartridge
Avid Custom X0 Trail TI hydraulic disc
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
